Class HighScoreManager

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.model.HighScoreManager
public class HighScoreManager extends Object
Utility class for managing high score persistence.

This class provides static methods to load and save high scores for both Classic and Phantom game modes. High scores are stored in separate files:

  • Classic mode: highscore.txt
  • Phantom mode: highscore_phantom.txt

This class cannot be instantiated. All methods are static and should be accessed via the class name.

If a high score file doesn't exist or cannot be read, the methods return 0. If saving fails, an error message is printed to stderr but no exception is thrown.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Rajul Kabir

      public static int loadHighScore(boolean isPhantomMode)
      Loads the high score from the file.
      Parameters:
      isPhantomMode - true for phantom mode high score, false for classic mode
      Returns:
